@context.title: @Context
@context.description: Specifies the vocabulary employed for understanding the structured data markup.

@type.title: Submission type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name or title
name.description: A text string with a descriptive name or title for the resource.

description.title: Description or abstract
description.description: A text string containing a description/abstract for the resource.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL for the landing page that describes the resource and where the content of the resource can be accessed. If there is no landing page, provide the URL of the content.

identifier.title: Identifiers
identifier.description: Any kind of identifier for the resource. Identifiers may be DOIs or unique strings assigned by a repository. Multiple identifiers can be entered. Where identifiers can be encoded as URLs, enter URLs here.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: Person or Organization that created the resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A person.

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing the full name of the person. Personal name format: Family Name, Given Name.

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the creator.

errorMessage.pattern: must match the ORCID pattern. e.g. '0000-0001-2345-6789'

affiliation.title: Affiliation
affiliation.description: The affiliation of the creator with the organization.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the organization the creator is affiliated with.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the provider organization or repository.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

dateCreated.title: Date created
dateCreated.description: The date on which the resource was created.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Keywords or tags used to describe the dataset, delimited by commas.

license.title: License
license.description: A license document that applies to the resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name
name.description: A text string indicating the name of the license under which the resource is shared.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL for a web page that describes the license.

description.title: Description
description.description: A text string describing the license or containing the text of the license itself.

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: The repository, service provider, organization, person, or service performer that provides access to the resource.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the provider organization or repository.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A person.

name.title: Name
name.description: A string containing the full name of the person. Personal name format: Family Name, Given Name.

email.title: Email
email.description: A string containing an email address for the provider.

errorMessage.pattern: must match the ORCID pattern. e.g. '0000-0001-2345-6789'

affiliation.title: Affiliation
affiliation.description: The affiliation of the creator with the organization.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the organization the creator is affiliated with.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

publisher.title: PublisherOrganization
publisher.description: Where the resource is permanently published, indicated the repository, service provider, or organization that published the resource - e.g., CUAHSI HydroShare. This may be the same as Provider.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the publisher organization or repository.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

datePublished.title: Date published
datePublished.description: Date of first publication for the resource.

subjectOf.title: Subject of
subjectOf.description: Link to or citation for a related resource that is about or describes this resource - e.g., a journal paper that describes this resource or a related metadata document describing the resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL address that serves as a reference to access additional details related to the record. It is important to note that this type of metadata solely pertains to the record itself and may not necessarily be an integral component of the record, unlike the HasPart metadata.

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about a related resource that is about or describes this resource - e.g., a related metadata document describing the resource.

version.title: Version
version.description: A text string indicating the version of the resource.

inLanguage.title: Language
inLanguage.description: The language of the content of the resource.

creativeWorkStatus.title: Resource status
creativeWorkStatus.description: The status of this resource in terms of its stage in a lifecycle. Example terms include Incomplete, Draft, Published, and Obsolete.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the item being defined.
description.default: The resource is in draft state and should not be considered final. Content and metadata may change

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the item being defined.
description.default: Data collection is ongoing or the resource is not completed

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the item being defined.
description.default: The resource has been replaced by a newer version, or the resource is no longer considered applicable

description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the item being defined.
description.default: The resource has been permanently published and should be considered final and complete

dateModified.title: Date modified
dateModified.description: The date on which the resource was most recently modified or updated.

funding.title: Funding
funding.description: A Grant or monetary assistance that directly or indirectly provided funding or sponsorship for creation of the resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: This metadata represents details about a grant or financial assistance provided to an individual(s) or organization(s) for supporting the work related to the record.

name.title: Name or title
name.description: A text string indicating the name or title of the grant or financial assistance.

description.title: Description
description.description: A text string describing the grant or financial assistance.

identifier.title: Funding identifier
identifier.description: Grant award number or other identifier.

funder.title: Funding Organization
funder.description: The organization that provided the funding or sponsorship.

url.title: URL
url.description: A URL to the homepage for the organization.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full address for the organization - e.g., “8200 Old Main Hill, Logan, UT 84322-8200”.

temporalCoverage.title: TemporalCoverage
temporalCoverage.description: The time period that applies to all of the content within the resource.

startDate.title: Start date
startDate.description: A date/time object containing the instant corresponding to the commencement of the time interval (ISO8601 formatted date - YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM).

errorMessage.formatMaximum: must be lesser than or equal to End date

endDate.title: End date
endDate.description: A date/time object containing the instant corresponding to the termination of the time interval (ISO8601 formatted date - YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM). If the ending date is left off, that means the temporal coverage is ongoing.

errorMessage.formatMinimum: must be greater than or equal to Start date

spatialCoverage.title: Place
spatialCoverage.description: The spatialCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the place(s) which are the focus of the content. It is a sub property of contentLocation intended primarily for more technical and detailed materials. For example with a Dataset, it indicates areas that the dataset describes: a dataset of New York weather would have spatialCoverage which was the place: the state of New York.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Represents the focus area of the record's content.

geo.title: Geo
geo.description: Specifies the geographic coordinates of the place in the form of a point location, line, or area coverage extent.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Geographic coordinates that represent a specific location on the Earth's surface. GeoCoordinates typically consists of two components: latitude and longitude.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Represents the angular distance of a location north or south of the equator, measured in degrees and ranges from -90 to +90 degrees.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Represents the angular distance of a location east or west of the Prime Meridian, measured in degrees and ranges from -180 to +180 degrees.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A structured representation that describes the coordinates of a geographic feature.

box.title: Box
box.description: A box is a rectangular region defined by a pair of coordinates representing the southwest and northeast corners of the box.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A property-value pair.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A property-value pair.

unitCode.title: Measurement unit
unitCode.description: The unit of measurement for the value.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the property.

minValue.title: Minimum value
minValue.description: The minimum allowed value for the property.

maxValue.title: Maximum value
maxValue.description: The maximum allowed value for the property.

measurementTechnique.title: Measurement technique
measurementTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in a measurement.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A property-value pair.

unitCode.description: The unit of measurement for the value.

description.title: Description

minValue.title: Minimum value

maxValue.title: Maximum value

measurementTechnique.title: Measurement technique

unitCode.description: The unit of measurement for the value.

description.title: Description
description.description: A description of the property.

measurementTechnique.title: Measurement technique
measurementTechnique.description: A technique or technology used in a measurement.

hasPart.title: Has part
hasPart.description: Link to or citation for a related resource that is part of this resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL address to the data resource.

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about a related resource that is part of this resource.

isPartOf.title: Is part of
isPartOf.description: Link to or citation for a related resource that this resource is a part of - e.g., a related collection.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL address to the data resource.

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about a related resource that this resource is a part of - e.g., a related collection.

associatedMedia.title: Resource content
associatedMedia.description: A media object that encodes this CreativeWork. This property is a synonym for encoding.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: An item that encodes the record.

contentUrl.title: Content URL
contentUrl.description: The direct URL link to access or download the actual content of the media object.

encodingFormat.title: Encoding format
encodingFormat.description: Represents the specific file format in which the media is encoded.

contentSize.title: Content size
contentSize.description: Represents the file size, expressed in bytes, kilobytes, megabytes, or another unit of measurement.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the media object (file).

sha256.title: SHA-256
sha256.description: The SHA-256 hash of the media object.

isPartOf.title: Is part of
isPartOf.description: Link to or citation for a related metadata document that this media object is a part of

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Submission type can include various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

url.title: URL
url.description: The URL address to the related metadata document.

description.title: Description
description.description: Information about a related metadata document.

citation.title: Citation
citation.description: A bibliographic citation for the resource.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Geographic coordinates that represent a specific location on the Earth's surface. GeoCoordinates typically consists of two components: latitude and longitude.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Represents the angular distance of a location north or south of the equator, measured in degrees and ranges from -90 to +90 degrees.

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: Represents the angular distance of a location east or west of the Prime Meridian, measured in degrees and ranges from -180 to +180 degrees.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: A structured representation that describes the coordinates of a geographic feature.

box.title: Box
box.description: A box is a rectangular region defined by a pair of coordinates representing the southwest and northeast corners of the box.
